testGraphs.name: test_simple_graph
testGraphs.description: Simple graph with minimal data for basic tests

basic.getAllUsers: MATCH (u:User) RETURN u ORDER BY u.id
basic.getAllProjects: MATCH (p:Project) RETURN p ORDER BY p.id

complex.userProjectStats: MATCH (u:User)-[r:WORKS_ON]->(p:Project) RETURN u.name, count(p) as project_count, collect(p.name) as projects
complex.activeProjectCollaborators: MATCH (u1:User)-[:WORKS_ON]->(p:Project {status: 'active'})<-[:WORKS_ON]-(u2:User) WHERE u1.id < u2.id RETURN u1.name, u2.name, p.name
